mapper.sql: id, nickname, enterpriseName, enterpriseURL, organizationCode, address, tel, contacts, email, password, registrationTime, status, companyAddress, companyEmail, companyTel
mapper.insert: insert into user (nickname, enterpriseName, enterpriseURL, organizationCode, address, tel, contacts, email, password, registrationTime, status, companyAddress, companyEmail, companyTel) values (#{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterpriseURL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registrationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{companyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update user
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enterpriseName = #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enterpriseURL = #{enterpriseURL,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organizationCode = #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
registrationTime = #{registrationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
companyAddress = #{companyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companyEmail = #{companyEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companyTel = #{companyTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enterpriseName = #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enterpriseURL = #{enterpriseURL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organizationCode = #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registrationTime = #{registrationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, companyAddress = #{companyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companyEmail = #{companyEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companyTel = #{companyTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(1) from user where email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, nickname, enterpriseName, enterpriseURL, organizationCode, address, tel, contacts, email, password, registrationTime, status, companyAddress, companyEmail, companyTel from user where email=#{email}
